mapper.sql: regOptId, operRoomId, operRoomName, instrnurseId1, circunurseId1, anesthetistId, circuAnesthetistId, perfusionDoctorId, startTime, instrnurseId2, circunurseId2, isHold, healthNurse, optBody, operRegDate, pcs, beid
mapper.insert: insert into bas_dispatch (regOptId, operRoomId, operRoomName, instrnurseId1, circunurseId1, anesthetistId, circuAnesthetistId, perfusionDoctorId, startTime, instrnurseId2, circunurseId2, isHold, healthNurse, optBody, operRegDate, pcs, beid ) values (#{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into bas_dispatch
regOptId,
operRoomId,
operRoomName,
instrnurseId1,
circunurseId1,
anesthetistId,
circuAnesthetistId,
perfusionDoctorId,
startTime,
instrnurseId2,
circunurseId2,
isHold,
healthNurse,
optBody,
operRegDate,
pcs,
beid,
#{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update bas_dispatch
operRoomId = #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operRoomName = #{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instrnurseId1 = #{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circunurseId1 = #{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
anesthetistId = #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circuAnesthetistId = #{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perfusionDoctorId = #{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instrnurseId2 = #{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
circunurseId2 = #{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isHold = #{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
healthNurse = #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optBody = #{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operRegDate = #{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcs = #{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_dispatch set operRoomId = #{operRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operRoomName = #{operRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instrnurseId1 = #{instrnurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circunurseId1 = #{circunurseId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, anesthetistId = #{anesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circuAnesthetistId = #{circuAnesthetistId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perfusionDoctorId = #{perfusionDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instrnurseId2 = #{instrnurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, circunurseId2 = #{circunurseId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isHold = #{isHold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, healthNurse = #{healthNurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optBody = #{optBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operRegDate = #{operRegDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcs = #{pcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where regOptId = #{regOptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.name as operRoomName, (select count(*) from bas_dispatch k,bas_reg_opt k1 where k.regOptId=k1.regOptId and k1.operaDate = o.operaDate and k.operRoomId=a.operRoomId AND k.isHold = a.isHold ) seq,o.deptName,o.name,o.designedOptName as realoperationName,o.designedAnaesMethodName, (select name from bas_user where bas_user.userName = a.anesthetistId)anesthetist_name, SUBSTRING(o.operatorName,LOCATE(',',o.operatorName)+1) operator_sec_name, CONCAT_WS(',',(select name from bas_user where bas_user.userName = a.circunurseId1),(select name from bas_user where bas_user.userName = a.circunurseId2)) circunurse_name FROM bas_dispatch a left join bas_reg_opt o on a.regOptId = o.regOptId left join bas_operroom m on a.operRoomId = m.operRoomId where 1 = 1 and o.state in ('03','04','05','06','07') and o.operaDate = CURDATE() order by a.operRoomId,a.startTime asc

SELECT o.deptName,o.bed,o.hid,IF(CHAR_LENGTH(o.name)>2,CONCAT(SUBSTRING(o.name,1,1),'*',SUBSTRING(o.name,CHAR_LENGTH(o.name),1)),CONCAT(SUBSTRING(o.name,1,1),'*')) as name, o.sex,(select codeName from bas_sys_code where groupId = 'operation_state' and codeValue = o.state and beid = #{baseQuery.beid}) as state, (select codeName from bas_sys_code where groupId = 'leave_to' and codeValue = IFNULL((select leaveto from doc_anaes_pacu_rec where regOptId = o.regOptId), (select leaveTo from doc_anaes_record where regOptId = o.regOptId and o.state=state)) and beid = #{baseQuery.beid}) leaveTo FROM bas_dispatch a left join bas_reg_opt o on a.regOptId = o.regOptId left join bas_operroom m on a.operRoomId = m.operRoomId where 1 = 1 and o.state in ('03','04','05','06','07') and o.operaDate = CURDATE() order by o.deptId,o.name,o.sex asc

select x.time,x.startTime from ( select 0 as time,'00:00' as startTime from dual union select 1 as time,'01:00' as startTime from dual union select 2 as time,'02:00' as startTime from dual union select 3 as time,'03:00' as startTime from dual union select 4 as time,'04:00' as startTime from dual union select 5 as time,'05:00' as startTime from dual union select 6 as time,'06:00' as startTime from dual union select 7 as time,'07:00' as startTime from dual union select 8 as time,'08:00' as startTime from dual union select 9 as time,'09:00' as startTime from dual union select 10 as time,'10:00' as startTime from dual union select 11 as time,'11:00' as startTime from dual union select 12 as time,'12:00' as startTime from dual union select 13 as time,'13:00' as startTime from dual union select 14 as time,'14:00' as startTime from dual union select 15 as time,'15:00' as startTime from dual union select 16 as time,'16:00' as startTime from dual union select 17 as time,'17:00' as startTime from dual union select 18 as time,'18:00' as startTime from dual union select 19 as time,'19:00' as startTime from dual union select 20 as time,'20:00' as startTime from dual union select 21 as time,'21:00' as startTime from dual union select 22 as time,'22:00' as startTime from dual union select 23 as time,'23:00' as startTime from dual ) x where x.time not in ( select startTime from bas_dispatch,bas_reg_opt where bas_dispatch.regOptId=bas_reg_opt.regOptId and bas_reg_opt.operaDate=#{operaDate} and bas_dispatch.operRoomId=#{operRoomId} and bas_reg_opt.state in ('02','03','04') and bas_reg_opt.beid = #{beid} )
UNION SELECT startTime AS TIME , IF(startTime < 10 , CONCAT('0',startTime,':00'),CONCAT(startTime,':00')) startTime FROM bas_dispatch WHERE regOptId = #{regOptId}
SELECT * FROM bas_dispatch a WHERE a.regOptId = #{regOptId}

SELECT c.*,(select bsc.codeName from bas_sys_code bsc where bsc.groupId='opt_body' and bsc.codeValue=c.optBody and bsc.beid = #{beid}) as 'optBodyName',u1.name as "instrnurseName1",u3.name as "instrnurseName2",u2.name as "circunurseName1",u4.name as "circunurseName2",b.name as "anesthetistName", u5.name as "circuanesthetistName",u6.name as "perfusiondoctorName",u7.name as "healthnurseName" FROM bas_dispatch c left join bas_user b on c.anesthetistId = b.userName left join bas_user u1 on c.instrnurseId1 = u1.userName left join bas_user u2 on c.circunurseId1 = u2.userName left join bas_user u3 on c.instrnurseId2 = u3.userName left join bas_user u4 on c.circunurseId2 = u4.userName left join bas_user u5 on c.circuanesthetistId = u5.userName left join bas_user u6 on c.perfusionDoctorId = u6.userName left join bas_user u7 on c.healthnurse = u7.userName WHERE c.regOptId = #{regOptId} LIMIT 1

select d.operRoomId,ro.operaDate from bas_dispatch d left join bas_reg_opt ro on d.regOptId = ro.regOptId where d.operRoomId is not null and d.beid = ro.beid and d.beid = #{beid} and ro.operaDate = #{operaDate} GROUP BY d.operRoomId
select count(*) from bas_dispatch d left join bas_reg_opt r on d.regOptId = r.regOptId where r.operaDate = #{operaDate} and d.operRoomId = #{operRoomId} and d.startTime = #{startTime}
select count(*) from bas_dispatch where regOptId = #{regOptId}
